title: How to Make a Sun Costume Out of Cardboard

steps.title: Select some solid cardboard for making the costume from.
steps.content: Select some solid cardboard for making the costume from. It should be large enough for your torso region or the torso region of the costume wearer. It should be sturdy enough for wearing (you don't want it flopping over).

steps.title: Cut out two circles that are wider than your torso.
steps.content: Cut out two circles that are wider than your torso. Draw the circles first, then use a craft knife on a safe cutting surface to cut out the circles.

steps.title: Poke two holes on the top of each circle.
steps.content: Poke two holes on the top of each circle. Use a pencil or the end of scissors to make the holes.

steps.title: Lace twine (or other strong rope) through the holes you just made.
steps.content: Lace twine (or other strong rope) through the holes you just made. Tie one end around the hole and leave the other end dangling. Be sure to use good lengths of twine or rope (see next step).

steps.title: Tie both sides of the rope to the other piece of cardboard so that the pieces of cardboard are connected.
steps.content: Tie both sides of the rope to the other piece of cardboard so that the pieces of cardboard are connected. However, leave enough space in between for your body, as one circle will sit on your back, one on your front. The twine or rope sits over your shoulders, so keep this in mind when deciding on the final length.

steps.title: Create the sun's rays.
steps.content: Create the sun's rays. Using leftover pieces of cardboard, cut out shapes that resemble stylized depictions of the sun's rays.

steps.title: Glue or staple these rays around each circle.
steps.content: Glue or staple these rays around each circle. If gluing on, allow to dry before proceeding to the next step.

steps.title: Paint each circle the colors of the sun.
steps.content: Paint each circle the colors of the sun. Mostly yellow but some orange and red touches to heat it up are fine.

steps.title: If you want your sun to have character, draw eyes and a smile on the front circle.
steps.content: If you want your sun to have character, draw eyes and a smile on the front circle.

steps.title: Allow the entire piece to dry.
steps.content: Allow the entire piece to dry.

steps.title: Dress in all yellow (or orange/red) clothing.
steps.content: Dress in all yellow (or orange/red) clothing.

steps.title: Put your neck through the top of the hole like your putting on a shirt.
steps.content: Put your neck through the top of the hole like your putting on a shirt. You're ready to hit the streets as the sun!
